official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide Federal financial assistance for the control of plague.

summary.text: Amends title III (General Powers and Duties) of the Public Health Service Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services, through the Director of the Centers for Disease Control, to provide financial assistance to States for the control of plague. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1987 and 1988.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide Federal financial assistance for the control of plague.
